channel.title: MusicTools by senote
channel.description: Recent content on MusicTools by senote

item.title: Ukulele Chord Chart | All Positions on the Fretboard
item.description:
Notes
Chord type
<section class="selection-summary">
 <div class="current-chord">
 <div class="current-chord-label">Selected chord</div>
 <div class="current-chord-value" id="current-chord-display">—</div>
 </div>
 <div class="status" id="status"></div>
</section>

<section class="board-wrapper">
 <div class="fret-numbers" id="fret-numbers"></div>
 <div id="fretboard"></div>
</section>

<section class="helper-panel display-panel">
 <div class="helper-group">
 <div class="helper-label">Display</div>
 <div class="helper-buttons" id="display-modes"></div>
 </div>
</section>

<section class="snapshot-panel">
 <div class="snapshot-actions">
 <button type="button" class="snapshot-button" id="snapshot-button">Snapshot</button>
 <button type="button" class="snapshot-button ghost" id="snapshot-pop-button">Remove one</button>
 </div>
 <div class="snapshot-list" id="snapshot-list"></div>
</section>
<footer></footer>

item.title: About
item.description: MusicTools by senote is a collection of simple browser-based tools for ukulele, bass, and guitar. The goal is to help you verify things quickly with minimal steps.

item.title: Contact
item.description:
For feedback, requests, or bug reports, please use the form below.
If you need a reply, include a valid email address.

  • English form: https://senote.com/contact_form_en.php
  • 日本語フォーム: https://senote.com/contact_form_ja.php

item.title: Privacy Policy
item.description:
This site may use third-party advertising services (Google AdSense). Ad providers may use cookies to serve ads based on user interests.

If analytics (e.g., Google Analytics) are enabled, traffic data may be collected via cookies. Collected data is anonymous and does not identify individuals.

Please expand this policy to match your actual operations.

item.title: Terms
item.description:
The information on this site is provided without warranty. Use the tools at your own risk.

Content may change or be discontinued without notice.
